column5: not much room for downrigg's but kinda cool  check this out....  gibbs
was on the discovery channel about 1-2 years ago, I'd love one.  Can anyone spot me $100 000
Does it come in a tiller version?
boys need their toys  a friend of the family had one of the old amphibian cars it was very slow but sure got lots of looks as it drives by
That's too cool!  Wonder if the trunk is a livewell....hmmmm

The vehicle is just a new Hi-Tech variation of the original Amphicar from the 60's  Check out the club site and view an original invoice.  Selling price in 1964 $2818.50 My wife's uncles neighbor in Lake Geneva Wisconsin had one and we used to go for rides in the lake on occasion.  Wasn't to fast but you sure got a lot of looks.  http://www.amphicar.com/
garyv-  thanks for the link on the older car's. those older cars have always peaked my interest.  -steven
